message.body: I miss you already
LAHV YAH
thought you should know
LUV U 2
4LYF3
But actually. I really really love you. I don't tell you how much I appreciate you enough
I love and appreciate you too :) and you don't need to say, I know!
I have to do mothers day things for the day. We'll talk tonight?
I'm having a picnic in staten island for some reason! Yay mothers day
Like, obvi
Great :)
Holla @ k blitz
Ha no
I'm visiting my grandma for mothers day, then heading home
Where ya at
Kk
Ok Anne-Laure
Rude
Wow I was going for James Wheaton
Home!
Right after I went out! I'll be home soon
I am getting sick, so I'm takin the day off, so I can take my AP tomorrow in health. No diner today!
Alright, feel better!
My dad might be out tomorrow night. $L33p 0v4h??
Where did you get your little glass vial
I don't text you for my health

Sorry, I've been in and out of it today. Also spent like an hour in the bathroom b/c antibiotics. I got my Advil vial from this art supply store in manhattan called metalliferous- it's awesome. Also I would totally sleep over, but tomorrow I have an AP, byc, and the rest of my scenes to write, so I can't
It's ok I was joking. That's fine cuz my dad isnt going to be out anyway. My friend needs a glass bottle like that which is why I'm asking. Feel better and good luck on your test!
Sorry if I came across as a dick
It's cool! I'm so out of it I wouldn't notice if you were the biggest dick alive
I just haven't seen you in so long I'm buggin out
Sorry I missed you after school. How was the test
Look what I can do now:
At the diner; broke; have a cup of coffee. Help!
We should talk about weekend plans. My schedule is a little hectic
Sorry buddy. Late start today. I'll see ya after/during school
Lame! That's ok. Also lame: I have to be in park slope at 5 for a byc rehearsal.
Boooo. I've been wanting to talk to you for days
Yeah, I haven't seen you like this whole week
I can't wait for Saturday
Just got to school. #2ndtermsenior #yolo
I have food for you!
Yayayayay where is u
Bagel
Cumming
ahh don't do that!
Have a good show
Hey, can we talk?
I'm in park slope, but we are done learning homeward bound
Yeah I'd like that
I'm also sorry, I shouldn't have just left. It was an immature overreaction
Ok- first off, I'm sorry, cause like idk why I've been so weird and out of it, but I need to stop
It's fine, just like, what incited that and what were you feeling

Many many things. I just generally didn't like the way you were talking to me all day. I understood what you meant but it just sounded mean when you said it. And I was just like fuck this bullshit. But seriously, thanks for the salmon, that was really nice and awesome of you
Like, don't even mention it. It's the least I could do. I'm back to being a person, I think.
I hope so. I love when you're a person
We have a lot to talk about on Saturday. I don't think we'll get to talk before then
I don't think so either. I'm looking forward to it, though
Me too
Can you just let me know if we're good or not
Like, I should be asking you that! We are rock solid, forever. Even if I'm temporarily dumb.
Good! Cuz if we weren't I would probably die. Just needed that verification
Where ya at
It's Matt coming to yet class. Wait ups
Ms wockenfuss is a judge. Like why
Haha too much
Fulton is pretty good but I don't think they're the right style for your concert. Also Sam lau has no stage presence. They'd be much better with a different lead singer
We're eating and then heading to the park in case y'all get there before us
Ok, that sounds about right, and I trust your response. They = not in
We are getting a bite before heading to the park
Keanu's tree?
Yeah we are right by it like in front of it
I feel really really bad. I'm so sorry. I didn't mean to hurt your feelings. Please don't doubt our relationship because of this.
We are not what up think we are, we are golden, we are golden
Yeah. Want me to take it out for you?
Wait that looks really great, is that at the library?
Yes please!! ￼This came in the mail yesterday and I am very excited
Haha nice. I have to remember where that book was
What's in the book you have
This book is pretty much just lyrics. I don't want to get you something you already have
Mines his autobio
Ohhh nice. Ok I'm getting this book. It's pretty cool
Time and place of show?
http://www.brooklynyouthchorus.org/index.php?p=90
I'll be there
Hello
Does the offer for next weekend still stand
Idk the details, but I want to spend some of next weekend with you, for sure. Ill tell you the details when I know, like tonight or tomorrow. Why?
Being with you in the hamptons is exactly what I want to do next week

What We Saw from the Cheap Seats by Regina Spektor (May 29) Safe Travels by Jukebox the Ghost (June 12) The Temper Trap by The Temper Trap (June 5) Valtari by Sigur Ros (May 29) Here by Edward Sharpe and the Magnetic Zeroes (May 29) Gossamer by Passion Pit (July 24) There's No Leaving Now by The Tallest Man on Earth (June 12)
Thank you!!! I am so excited about all of these!
No probz! Did you have a good conversation with Matt?

Like, sort of. It was mad awk cuz Julia called me when we were sitting in the kitchen, and I had a good chat with her. Me and Matt talked a little, and decided to talk more Friday, when we have the day off cause chamber. Cause we were both tired. He's just leaving now
Alright that's good. I felt badly for not knowing how to talk to him
We watched a few episodes of this show I wanted to show him, which was nice. I started getting tired and stuff, so I'm glad we got to spend time without me having to do anything.
Yeah that's good. Alone time with Matt can be a kind of strenuous experience.
That's the scariest thing I've ever seen
Like, actually. He sent us this willingly. He's giving more quizzes this monday and Tuesday. I hate him.
He sucks. I also have a math test on Tuesday. Like that's going to help at all. I hate my teacher too
Grease is the word on the radio.
Like where are you
Diner
“Making Room: When I first met him, I knew in a moment I would have to spend the next few days re-arranging my mind so there'd be room for him to stay.” ― Brian Andreas
￼Wtf
